DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to correlate the dynamic cerebrovascular autoregulation by patients with sepsis with a sepsis-associated delirium.
DOC.criteria: clinical symptoms of sepsis, severe sepsis and septic shock possibility for measurement of transcranial doppler ultrasound age over 18 years preexisting cerebrovascular disease preexisting immunological disease traumatic brain injury intracranial infectious disease pregnancy
DOC.keyword: Measurement techniques, flow velocity waveform analysis
